headline: Scott Holden Joins Vanta as Chief Marketing Officer
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 15, 2025--Vanta, the first and only AI-powered trust management platform, today announced that Scott Holden has joined the company as its Chief Marketing Officer. As CMO, Holden will oversee the entire Marketing department including brand, product marketing, demand generation, growth, communications and field marketing. Holden will report to Vanta CEO Christina Cacioppo.

Holden will report to Vanta CEO Christina Cacioppo.

headline: Has DOCU's 15% Year-to-Date Decline Created a Buying Opportunity?
summary: DOCU is down 15% YTD despite solid cash flow and key integrations, but is this a reset or just a stall?

headline: Nortal Acquires Nearsure to Expand AI Enterprise Solutions Across the Americas
summary: Nearsure’s Tech Talent Combines with Nortal’s U.S. Scale and Global Reach, Powered by a Shared Customer-first VisionKIRKLAND, Wash., July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nortal, a multinational digital transformation company, today announced its acquisition of Nearsure, a U.S.-based technology solutions provider with talent across 18 Latin American countries. The merger accelerates Nortal’s expansion across the Americas by tapping into Latin America’s world-class tech talent and increasing capacity

headline: Workato Completes Workday Certified Integration for Salesforce CRM and CPQ
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., July 15, 2025--Workato®, the leader in agentic orchestration, has received Workday Certified Integration badges for its Salesforce CRM and CPQ accelerators. The packaged solutions, which offer pre-built workflows and documentation, help customers go-live faster with easier customization and lower total cost of ownership. Specifically, the CPQ accelerator addresses eight core Opportunity-to-Cash use cases (New Orders, Renewals, Cancellations, Add-ons, Co-terminations, Upgrades,

headline: inMorphis Appoints Sunne K Kumaar as Chief Revenue Officer to Accelerate Global Growth
summary: inMorphis, a ServiceNow-invested company and fast-growing digital transformation firm, is delighted to announce the appointment of Sunne K Kumaar as their new Chief Revenue Officer (CRO).

headline: ShiftUp Assembles World-Class Technical Leadership Team with Three Strategic Hires from Salesforce
summary: PHOENIX, July 15, 2025--ShiftUp, the pioneering platform transforming go-to-market workflows through intelligent automation, today announced the appointment of three distinguished technology leaders to its team. The company has recruited Ben Myles as Chief Technology Officer, Jonathan Rico as Head of Engineering and Product, and Mark Holton as Lead Sr. Software Architect—all veterans of Salesforce's groundbreaking Agentforce & Einstein AI platform.

headline: Harding Loevner Global Equity Q2 2025 Report
summary: The Global Equity composite rose 10.3% gross of fees in the second quarter, lagging the 11.7% gain in the MSCI ACWI Index.
